title: Close Combat 5 Invasion Normandy - 1946 v1.2 Mod
description:
This mod originally seeded by by http://www.closecombatseries.net/.

Name: Close Combat 1946
For: Close Combat 5 - Invasion Normandy
Version 1.2
By: Nomada_Firefox


Description: Close Combat 1946 is a fictional mod. Imagine if Germany won  
the battle of Stalingrad and made contact on the ground in Asia with Japan.  
This mod introduces many new units, sounds, weapons and battlegroups. 24  
maps are included from GJS, Bloody Omaha and the original game.

Installation:

1. Full installation of Close Combat 5 Invasion Normandy required. (Not  
included)
2. Install CC5_Patch_v5.01a.exe (Included)
3. Install Cfg13.zip (This is the Config Manager used to install mods -  
included)
4. Unzip CC5_1946_AllMaps.zip to C:Program FilesSSIClose Combat Invasion  
NormandyMaps or equivalent folder.
5. Unzip all remaining archives to C:Config ManagerPlugins or equivalent.
6. Run the Config Manager and install
7. Play CC5

Notes: The remaining four PLN filesare optional  
language submods. View thier readme files for more information.

For additional info, patches, how to guides and updates for this mod and  
all others visit http://www.closecombatseries.net/. To play online install  
the included GameSpy Arcade client (ArcadeInstallFull205-google.exe) and  
join the Close Combat 5 Invasion Normandy Room.

http://www.closecombatseries.net" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
